{{Wired embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=PL-X31 |revision=M |upc=610839356263 |asin=B005FM6BVA |manuf_country=China |manuf=SGE |manuf_model=NU-Pi699E |manuf_rev=2.4P12A-3 |availability= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |pcb_id= |type=Powerline Adapter |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.06 |pwr_conn= |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=INT6400;INT6400A1G; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1606E |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8032 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=PLC AFE;Atheros;INT1400;;1; |flags=HomePlug AV |oui_eth=BC:AE:C5 }} {{TagLine|200Mbps HomePlug AV Ethernet Adapter}} :[https://www.asus.com/Networking/PLX31M/ Product Page]
"PI699E2.4P12A-3-EUP-MB REV1.0" is silkscreened on the main board. :This is a [[Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics]] ([[SGE]]) P/N. :It is likely this [http://www.twsz.com/en/product/67/263.html 200Mbps Mini Powerline Wall Mount Adapter].
PL-X32M may be the same product sold in a two-adapter kit. <!-- *[http://foxnetlab.com/index.php/16-reviews/30-asus-pl-x32m ''Reviews'' on '''FoxNetLab'''] --> *[https://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/36-reviews/103-asus-pl-x32m.html/ ''Review'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU)
